Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.observer.LambdaObservable<Transmittable>

public class Player
extends LambdaObservable<Transmittable>

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private FaithTrack faithTrack
    Player's personal Faith Track, handles faith points and pope favor tiles.
    private java.util.Optional<Action> gameAction  
    private boolean isDisconnected
    Set to true if the connection with the player fails and their turn is to be skipped.
    private boolean isMyTurn
    True if it's the player's turn, false otherwise.
    private java.util.List<LeaderCard> leaderCards  
    private boolean mainAction
    True if the player can still perform their action for this turn, false if it has already been used.
    private java.lang.String nickname
    The player's nickname, used to identify them in case of reconnection.
    private java.util.List<Slot> slots
    Special production that turns 2 resources of any kind into one resource of any kind.
    private Strongbox strongbox
    Infinite depot where the production outputs are stored.
    private java.util.List<Resource> tempResources  
    private java.util.List<Depot> warehouse

      public void addSpecialSlot​(Resource cost)

      Parameters:

    • tempResourcesContains

      public boolean tempResourcesContains​(Resource resource)
      Preemptively checks if tempResources contains the argument. Used to check that nothing has gone wrong with the messages.
      Parameters:
      resource - resource to check for.
      Returns:
      whether the resource is present or not.
